# NON-CONFORMANCE ADVICE (NCA) - DIGITAL FORM WIREFRAME

## Document Overview
**Purpose:** Capture all non-conformance incidents during production with full traceability  
**Form Reference:** Based on existing hard copy NCA form (BRCGS compliance)  
**Digital Implementation:** Integrated with OHiSee Operations Intelligence Centre  
**Auto-Generated Fields:** Date, NCA Number, Kangopak WO Number, Raised By (from active session)

---

## WIREFRAME LAYOUT

---

## FIELD SPECIFICATIONS

### Auto-Generated Fields (System-Populated)
| Field | Source | Editable | Notes |
|-------|--------|----------|-------|
| Date | System timestamp | No | Captured at "Record NCA" button press |
| NCA Number | Sequential generator | No | Format: NCA-YYYY-######### |
| Kangopak WO Number | Active production session | No | Linked to current work order |
| Raised By | User session/login | No | Operator currently logged in |
| Work Order Status | Production system | No | Real-time status display |

### Required Fields (Cannot Submit Without)
- NC Type Classification
- NC Product Description
- Description of NC/Incident (min 100 chars)
- Machine Status (Down or Operational)
- Sample Available
- Any cross contamination
- Hold label completed
- NCA number recorded on log sheet
- All Disposition checkboxes

### Conditional Required Fields
- If Cross Contamination = YES: Person names and Team Leader signatures required
- If Rework/Sorting = YES: Rework instruction required
- If Temporary Repair = YES: Close out date required

### Validation Rules
1. Cannot submit form until all *REQUIRED fields completed
2. Machine Status must be explicitly selected (no default)
3. If Machine Down selected, automatic priority alert sent to maintenance/management
4. Disposition section must have at least one action selected
5. Root cause and corrective action minimum 50 characters if entered
6. Close Out can only be completed by authorized personnel (QA/Management role)

### Digital Signature Implementation
- Use login authentication as digital signature
- Capture username, timestamp, and IP address
- Store as audit trail entry
- Alternative: Touch/stylus signature pad for tablet interfaces

---

## INTEGRATION REQUIREMENTS

### Work Order Linkage
- NCA automatically linked to active work order at time of creation
- Bidirectional relationship maintained in database
- Work order closure validation: checks for open NCAs

### Navigation Flow
1. Operator in waste metrics screen â†’ Clicks "Record Non-Conformance Advice"
2. System captures active work order context
3. Redirects to NCA form with auto-populated fields
4. Upon submission â†’ Entry added to NCA Register
5. Return to production screen with confirmation

### Register Update
- Automatic entry creation in NCA Advice Register upon submission
- Real-time status updates (Draft â†’ Submitted â†’ Under Review â†’ Closed)
- Management dashboard shows pending NCAs requiring attention

### Notification Triggers
- Machine Down status â†’ Immediate SMS/email to Operations Manager
- Critical NC type â†’ Alert to Quality Manager
- Submission confirmation â†’ Email to Raised By user
- Daily summary â†’ Consolidated report to management

---

## MOBILE RESPONSIVENESS
- Form must be fully functional on tablets (shop floor use)
- Touch-friendly input controls (minimum 44px tap targets)
- Portrait and landscape orientation support
- Offline data capture with sync capability
- Large text areas with zoom capability for detailed descriptions

---

## BRCGS COMPLIANCE NOTES
This digital form must maintain all traceability and documentation requirements per BRCGS Issue 7:
- Complete audit trail of all entries and modifications
- Timestamp and user tracking for all actions
- Export capability for external audit documentation
- Historical data retention (minimum 3 years)
- Tamper-evident logging of changes
